column2: Sasha and Charlie caught the 6:52 from Victoria to Merrifield the following morning, and arrived at the local Labour Party headquarters just before 8 a.m.
Having lied to Mum, I realised that my only option was to take the 06.52 to London as if I hadn't been dismissed at all.
column3: The Hunger and the Howling of Killian Lone
